mapper.select: SELECT id,name,leader,telephone,centerX,centerY,pId,zoom,code,workTime,shiftDays,checkInTime,innerCode,pyCode,wbCode,shortName,isUse,sCode,radioNo,caseInfoStationCode,serviceStationCode,updateDt,groupIds FROM (select ROW_NUMBER() Over(order by ${orderField} ) as rowNum, * from Station where ${filter}) tb where rowNum between ${fromRecord} and ${toRecord}

with cte as ( select id, pid, cast(id as nvarchar(max)) as path, 1 as TLevel, id as mapping from dbo.station where id = ${stationId}
union all select c.id,c.pid, p.path+'-'+cast(c.id as nvarchar(max)) as path,p.TLevel+1 as TLevel, case when p.TLevel < 2 then c.id else p.mapping end as mapping from cte P inner join dbo.station c on p.id=c.pid ) SELECT s.id,s.name,s.centerX,s.centerY,s.pId,s.zoom,s.code,s.shiftDays,s.isUse FROM Station s inner join cte c on c.id =s.id inner join stationGroup g on g.stationId = s.Id where g.GroupId = ${stationGroupId} order by s.pid,s.id
mapper.update:
update Role set
name=#{name}, leader=#{leader}, telephone=#{telephone}, centerX=#{centerX}, centerY=#{centerY}, pId=#{pId}, zoom=#{zoom}, code=#{code}, workTime=#{workTime}, shiftDays=#{shiftDays}, checkInTime=#{checkInTime}, innerCode=#{innerCode}, pyCode=#{pyCode}, wbCode=#{wbCode}, shortName=#{shortName}, isUse=#{isUse}, sCode=#{sCode}, radioNo=#{radioNo}, caseInfoStationCode=#{caseInfoStationCode}, serviceStationCode=#{serviceStationCode}, updateDt=#{updateDt}, groupIds=#{groupIds} where id=#{id}
